# password

**Type Property**

A property that defines the content in a text input area as a password.

## Declaration

```swift
static let password: NSTextContentType
```

## Managing accounts

- **username**: A property that defines the content in a text input area as an account or login name.
- **newPassword**: A property that defines the content in a text input area as a new password.

items.description: A property that defines the content in a text input area as an account or login name.
items.name: username

items.description: A property that defines the content in a text input area as a new password.
items.name: newPassword
